k thx[br][size=1]Posted at: November 18, 2006, 03:07:18 PM[/size][hr]now how do i edit accounts like edit stats and theyre items, it wont work on test but it works on pimp and project 16

item.title: Testscape help
item.dc:creator: @Blake11roys Blake11roys
item.description:
@Blake11roys wrote:

go to client.java and search

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

below you should see

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

just change admin to w/e u want ur account name to be and then the name “admin” wont be owner but the name u put will be[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 09:54:30 PM[/size][hr]hmm its been like 30 mins since u posted so i’ll message it to u

Read full topic
